document_data.name: Ripen Plant
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ripen plant''''' was a [[divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that caused a living plant to mature and age until it reached a state of ripeness.
document_data.Effects:
When this spell was cast, the affected plant aged for ten minutes, until it became fully ripe and its flowers and fruit bloomed.

If ''ripen plant'' was cast upon a [[magic]]ally-controlled plant, it functioned as per the ''[[hold plant]]'' spell.
document_data.History: The specifications of the spell were inscribed upon one of the "inner petals" of the [[Chauntea]]n [[relic]], the ''[[Glarathra]]''.
document_data.Components: In order to be cast, ''ripen plant'' required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
